fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: ITIC is strictly not a lobbying organization and makes no attempts to effect EU initiatives.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: ITIC organizes unique annual programs that bring together government officials academic experts and industry representatives to discuss taxation issues and measures to improve national and regional investment climates with a focus in non-OECD countries. ITIC has institutionalized regional tax forums in Africa, Asia-Pacific, Eurasia, and Middle East/North Africa.
goals__remit: ITIC encourages tax, trade and investment policies that enhance economic growth in non-OECD countries by facilitating mutual understanding between business and government through the ITIC “neutral table,” where stakeholders convene to discuss academic analyses, policy studies and international best practices.
